src:
Litvanci iznenadili u Krasnodaru
05 Nov 2019, 19:03 by Darko
Lokomotiva Kubanj – Ritas 82:87 (20:25, 23:19, 17:19, 22:24)
U prvoj utakmici 6. kola B grupe Evrokupa košarkaši Ritasa su napravili iznenađenje u Krasnodaru. Litvanski tim je prekinuo seriju od četiri uzastopna poraza i savladao Lokomotivu.
U meču sa mnogo preokreta, Ritas je bolje finiširao. Lokomotiva je serijom od 14:0 stigla do najvećeg vođstva od osam poena razlike (75:67), pet minuta pre kraja, ali su Litvanci još snažnije odgovorili. U poslednja tri minuta ruski tim je postigao samo jedan poen, a Ritas je serijom od 9:1 obezbedio pobedu.
Najefikasniji kod pobednika bili su Kairis sa 16, Bendžijus sa 12 i Pako Kruz sa 11 poena. Kulagin je postigao 18 poena za Lokomotivu, Deker dva poena manje, a Dragan Apić je dodao 12 poena, uz pet skokova.
Posle šestog kola Lokomotiva i Ritas imaju skor od dve pobede i četiri poraza u grupi B Evrokupa, u kojoj je na prvom mestu Partizan.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Lithuanians surprised in Krasnodar
05 Nov 2019, 18:03 by Darko
Lokomotiva Kubanj - Ritas 82:87 (20:25, 23:19, 17:19, 22:24)
In the first game of the 6th round of Group B of the Eurocup, Ritas basketball players made a surprise appearance in Krasnodar. The Lithuanian team broke a series of four consecutive defeats and defeated Lokomotiv.
In a match with many turnovers, Ritas finished better. The Lokomotiva reached the biggest lead of eight points with a series of 14-0 (75:67), five minutes before the end, but the Lithuanians responded even more strongly. In the last three minutes, the Russian team scored only one point, and Ritas secured the win with a 9-1 series.
The most efficient of the winners were Cairis with 16, Benghazi with 12 and Pako Cruz with 11 points. Kulagin scored 18 points for Lokomotiva, Deker two points less and Dragan Apic added 12 points with five rebounds.
After the sixth round Lokomotiv and Ritas have a score of two wins and four defeats in Group B of Eurocup, in which Partizan comes first.
